message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I want a bit more, 60-40 is still fair!
I'll give you a slight raise to 45, but that's my final offer. We're losing value with every round!
You're losing value, I'm not. 65-35 is the new fair!
Okay, I'll give you your 60, but we both need to accept now. This is getting ridiculous!
